General.Name: K-One Technology Bhd
General.Description: K-One Technology Berhad engages in the research, design, and development of electronic end-products and sub-systems for the healthcare, medical, Internet of Things (IoT), industrial, and consumer electronics industries. The company operates through Research, Design, Development and Sales; Manufacturing; Cloud Computing; and Investment holding segments. It engages in the manufacture, supply, and trading of electronic security and smart surveillance solutions, consumer electronic products, healthcare equipment, medical devices and consumables, and digital devices and related accessories, as well as electronic headlamps, industrial equipment, and IoT gadgets; and design and development of production tools. The company also provides consultancy, hardware development, and integration services; cloud computing services, including infrastructure as a service, platform as a service, cloud design, consultancy and management, and mobile application and development; co-working space; and capital funding and business advisory services. It offers its products and services in Malaysia, rest of Asia, Europe, the United States, and Oceania. K-One Technology Berhad was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
